name: RAINBRO
description:
Enter the world of Robopocalypse!

"Color is the most powerful thing in the world" ~me, just now.

Features:

  • MANY different colors of enemies!
  • U P G R A D E S!
  • Loads of fun
  • No happy ending!
  • Weapons!
  • Cool effects!
  • Pixel art!
  • Main menu!
  • Camera effects!
